title: Finiteness of semibricks and brick-finite algebras
summary: For a finite-dimensional algebra Λ, we establish an explicit bijection between widely generated torsion(-free) classes and semibricks in mod Λ. Using the kappa order on the lattice of torsion classes with canonical join representations, we provide several equivalent conditions for brick-finite algebras. We show that Λ is brick-finite if and only if any chain of wide subcategories of mod Λ becomes eventually constant, if and only if any torsion class in mod Λ has finitely many covers, if and only if every semibrick in mod Λ is a finite set. Thus, we give a proof of Enomoto's conjecture (Adv. Math., 393 (2021), 108113). As a consequence, we show that Λ is brick-finite if and only if every wide subcategory closed under coproducts of Mod Λ is closed under products, if and only if every wide subcategory of mod Λ is functorially finite. This gives a positive answer to the question posed by Angeleri Hügel and Sentieri (J. Algebra, 664 (2025), 164-205).

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了有限维代数中广泛生成扭类与半砖之间的双射关系，证明了砖有限代数的若干等价条件，并解决了Enomoto猜想和Angeleri Hügel与Sentieri提出的问题。
AI.motivation: 研究有限维代数中扭类、半砖和宽子范畴之间的关系，旨在证明Enomoto关于砖有限代数的猜想，并解决Angeleri Hügel和Sentieri提出的相关问题。
AI.method: 使用扭类格上的kappa序和规范并表示，建立广泛生成扭类与半砖之间的显式双射，分析链条件和覆盖性质。
AI.result: 证明了Λ是砖有限代数当且仅当任意宽子范畴链最终稳定，当且仅当任意扭类有有限多个覆盖，当且仅当所有半砖都是有限集。
AI.conclusion: 成功证明了Enomoto猜想，并给出了砖有限代数的多个等价刻画，为相关代数结构的研究提供了重要工具和结果。

title: Distinguished representations for $\rm{SL}(n,F)$
summary: Let $F$ be a finite field, and let $\mathbb{E}$ be either a quadratic field extension $E/F$ or the split algebra $F \oplus F$. We study distinguished representations of $\rm{SL}_{2n}(F)$ by the subgroup $H_{\flat} := \rm{SL}_{2n}(F) \cap \rm{GL}_{n}(\mathbb{E})$, which is a variation of the work of Anandavardhanan and Prasad on distinguished representations of $\rm{SL}_{n}(\mathbb{E})$ by the subgroup $\rm{SL}_n(F)$. This is in a similar framework of our earlier work of a $p$-adic non-split variation of Anandavardhanan-Prasad over finite fields. We give a formula for the dimension of the complex vector space $\rm{Hom}_{H_{\flat}}(π_{\flat}, 1)$ in terms of certain characters of $F^{\times}$, where $π_{\flat}$ is an irreducible representation which is also distinguished by $H_{\flat}$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究有限域上SL_{2n}(F)群在子群H_♭ := SL_{2n}(F) ∩ GL_n(𝔼)上的可区分表示，其中𝔼是F的二次扩域或分裂代数F⊕F。给出了可区分不可约表示π_♭的Hom空间维数公式。
AI.motivation: 这是对Anandavardhanan和Prasad关于SL_n(𝔼)在SL_n(F)上可区分表示工作的变体研究，延续了作者之前在有限域上p进非分裂变体的研究框架。
AI.method: 研究SL_{2n}(F)在子群H_♭ := SL_{2n}(F) ∩ GL_n(𝔼)上的可区分表示，其中𝔼是二次扩域或分裂代数。
AI.result: 给出了复向量空间Hom_{H_♭}(π_♭, 1)维数的公式，该公式用F^×的某些特征表示。
AI.conclusion: 建立了有限域上SL_{2n}(F)在子群H_♭上可区分表示的维数公式，扩展了相关理论框架。

title: Intersection vectors over skew-tilings
summary: We prove that under a mild condition, a multiset of tagged permissible arcs over a skew-tiling is uniquely determined by its intersection vector. As an application, it is proved that -- up to isomorphism -- different $τ$-rigid modules over a skew-gentle algebra $A$ arising from a skew-triple $(Q,Sp,I)$ have different dimension vectors if and only if $(Q,I)$ has no minimal oriented cycle of even-length with full zero relations. This generalizes a recent work of Fu-Geng for gentle algebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明在温和条件下，斜铺砌上的带标签允许弧多重集由其交集向量唯一确定。应用表明，不同τ-刚性模在同构意义下具有不同维向量当且仅当(Q,I)没有具有完全零关系的偶数长度最小有向环。
AI.motivation: 推广Fu-Geng关于温和代数的工作，研究斜温和代数中τ-刚性模的维向量唯一性问题。
AI.method: 通过斜铺砌上的带标签允许弧多重集及其交集向量的关系进行研究，应用组合方法分析代数结构。
AI.result: 证明了不同τ-刚性模具有不同维向量的充要条件是(Q,I)没有具有完全零关系的偶数长度最小有向环。
AI.conclusion: 该结果将Fu-Geng关于温和代数的结论推广到更一般的斜温和代数情形。

title: The Green ring of a restricted enveloping algebra in characteristic 2
summary: Let $\Bbbk$ be an algebraically closed field of characteristic $2$ and let $\mathfrak{fsl}(2)$ be the unique, up to isomorphism, $3$-dimensional simple Lie algebra over $\Bbbk$. Denote by $\mathfrak{m}$ the minimal $2$-envelope of $\mathfrak{fsl}(2)$ and by $\mathfrak{u}(\mathfrak{m})$ its corresponding restricted enveloping algebra. The non-isomorphic finite-dimensional indecomposable $\mathfrak{u}(\mathfrak{m})$-modules were classified in \cite{ABDF}. In this paper, the Green ring (or representation ring) for $\mathfrak{u}(\mathfrak{m})$ is calculated. Also, the semisimplification of the representation category of $\mathfrak{u}(\mathfrak{m})$ is determined.

AI.tldr: 本文计算了特征为2的代数闭域上最小2-包络代数𝔲(𝔪)的Green环，并确定了其表示范畴的半单化。
AI.motivation: 由于特征2的代数闭域上3维单李代数𝔣𝔰𝔩(2)的最小2-包络代数𝔲(𝔪)的有限维不可分解模已被分类，本文旨在进一步研究其表示理论，特别是计算Green环和确定表示范畴的半单化。
AI.method: 基于已有的𝔲(𝔪)有限维不可分解模分类结果，通过代数方法计算Green环结构，并分析表示范畴的半单化性质。
AI.result: 成功计算了𝔲(𝔪)的Green环，并确定了其表示范畴的半单化结构。
AI.conclusion: 本文完整描述了𝔲(𝔪)的Green环结构，并给出了其表示范畴半单化的明确结果，为特征2李代数表示理论提供了重要贡献。

title: On the classification of quantum symmetries
summary: We show that, in order to classify Hopf algebra (co)actions on a given finite dimensional algebra up to equivalence, one should start with the classification of the possible cosupports (i.e. the sets of linear operators by which $H^*$ is acting) of Hopf algebra coactions and then consider dual Hopf algebra actions. As an application, we classify quantum symmetries of the set of two points and the algebra of dual numbers. In addition, we show that the straight line does not admit an (ungraded) universal coacting Manin Hopf algebra. Moreover, we prove that for $n\geqslant 14$ the full matrix algebra $M_n(\mathbb k)$ admits a nontrivial Hopf algebra coaction such that all Hopf algebra actions with the same restriction on the cosupport are trivial, i.e. the cosupport may reduce under the dualization and a finite dimensional algebra may have less equivalence classes of actions than coactions. Simultaneously, for any $n\geqslant 14$, we define an elementary grading on $M_n(\mathbb k)$ by an infinite group that cannot be regraded by any finite group. (The previously known lower bound was $n\geqslant 349$.)

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Hopf代数在有限维代数上的作用和余作用的分类问题，通过余支撑集分类方法，分析了量子对称性，并证明了某些代数不存在通用的余作用Hopf代数，同时改进了矩阵代数初等分级的已知下界。
AI.motivation: 研究Hopf代数在有限维代数上的作用和余作用的等价分类问题，探索量子对称性分类的新方法，并改进矩阵代数初等分级的已知结果。
AI.method: 通过余支撑集（cosupport）分类方法，首先分类Hopf代数余作用的可能余支撑集，然后考虑对偶Hopf代数作用。应用该方法分析具体代数如两点集、对偶数代数和直线等。
AI.result: 分类了两点集和对偶数代数的量子对称性；证明了直线不存在通用的余作用Manin Hopf代数；对于n≥14的矩阵代数Mn(k)，存在非平凡Hopf代数余作用；改进了矩阵代数初等分级的已知下界从n≥349到n≥14。
AI.conclusion: 余支撑集分类是研究Hopf代数作用和余作用等价分类的有效方法，对偶化过程中余支撑集可能减少，有限维代数的作用等价类可能少于余作用等价类。同时显著改进了矩阵代数初等分级的下界结果。

title: Cohomology of Lie conformal algebroids
summary: We study Lie conformal algebroids (LCAd) and their representations using the language of lambda-brackets and Lie conformal algebras. We describe several general constructions, such as the LCAd of conformal derivations CDer(A) of a differential algebra A, the gauge LCAd G(A,M) associated to a differential algebra A and its module M, the current LCAd F^ of a Lie algebroid F, and the LCAd structure of the space Omega(V) of Kahler differentials over a Poisson vertex algebra (PVA) V. We develop the cohomology theories of LCAd and we relate them to the corresponding cohomology theories of PVA. In particular, we find an isomorphism between the cohomology of a PVA V with coefficients in a module M and the corresponding cohomology of the LCAd Omega(V) with coefficients in the same module.

AI.tldr: 本文研究李共形代数丛及其表示，使用λ-括号和李共形代数语言描述多个构造，包括微分代数的共形导子、规范LCAd、李代数丛的流LCAd，以及泊松顶点代数上Kähler微分空间的LCAd结构。开发了LCAd的上同调理论，并将其与泊松顶点代数的上同调理论联系起来。
AI.motivation: 研究李共形代数丛及其表示理论，建立与泊松顶点代数上同调理论的联系，为相关数学结构提供统一的理论框架。
AI.method: 使用λ-括号和李共形代数语言，构造多种李共形代数丛，包括共形导子、规范LCAd、流LCAd等，并发展相应的上同调理论。
AI.result: 发现了泊松顶点代数V与其系数在模M上的上同调与相应LCAd Ω(V)在相同模上的上同调之间的同构关系。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了李共形代数丛与泊松顶点代数之间的深刻联系，为上同调理论提供了新的视角和工具。

title: Affinization of shifted quantum affine $\mathfrak{gl}_2$
summary: We give a realization $\mathcal{A}_0$ of quantum toroidal algebra associated to $\mathfrak{gl}_2$ which can be viewed as an affinization of the Drinfeld new realization of quantum affine $\mathfrak{gl}_2$. We use this realization to define an affinization $\mathcal{A}_N$, $N\in{\mathbb Z}$, of shifted quantum affine $\mathfrak{gl}_2$. We construct a large family of representations of dominantly shifted algebra $\mathcal A_N$, $N>0$. The examples of representations with even positive $N$ appear in the study of extensions of deformed $W$-algebras of type $\mathfrak{gl}(N+2|1)$.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了量子环面代数的一个实现，并将其视为量子仿射gl2的Drinfeld新实现的仿射化，进而定义了移位量子仿射gl2的仿射化，并构造了其表示族。
AI.motivation: 研究量子环面代数与量子仿射代数之间的关系，特别是通过仿射化过程来定义移位量子仿射代数，并探索其表示理论。
AI.method: 给出了量子环面代数的一个具体实现，将其视为量子仿射gl2的Drinfeld新实现的仿射化，然后定义移位量子仿射gl2的仿射化，并构造其表示。
AI.result: 成功构造了支配性移位代数的大族表示，其中偶数正N的表示出现在变形W-代数的扩展研究中。
AI.conclusion: 通过量子环面代数的实现，建立了与量子仿射代数的联系，并为移位量子仿射代数提供了丰富的表示理论框架。

title: Algebras determined by $τ$-slices
summary: In this paper we revisit the notion of strict laura algebras through the lens of $τ$-tilting theory to define the family of algebras determined by $τ$-slices. We show that the representation dimension of every algebra determined by $τ$-slices satisfying mild conditions is at most three.

AI.tldr: 本文通过τ-倾斜理论的视角重新审视严格Laura代数，定义了由τ-切片确定的代数族，并证明在温和条件下这些代数的表示维数最多为三。
AI.motivation: 重新审视严格Laura代数，利用τ-倾斜理论来定义新的代数族，旨在研究这些代数的表示维数性质。
AI.method: 使用τ-倾斜理论框架，通过τ-切片的概念来定义代数族，并分析其表示维数。
AI.result: 证明了在温和条件下，由τ-切片确定的代数的表示维数最多为三。
AI.conclusion: 通过τ-倾斜理论可以定义一类具有有限表示维数的代数，这类代数的表示维数不超过三，为代数表示论提供了新的研究视角。

title: Cayley--Hamilton Theorem for Orthogonal Quantum Matrix Algebras
summary: For a family of the orthogonal $O(k)$ type Quantum Matrix algebras we establish an analogue of the Cayley--Hamilton theorem. The form of the Cayley-Hamilton identity is different in three cases. First, the cases of odd ($k=2\ell -1$) and even ($k=2\ell$) heights are different. Second, for even height orthogonal Quantum Matrix algebra we derive two versions of the Cayley--Hamilton theorem, one for its positive component $O^+(2\ell)$ and another one for the negative component $O^-(2\ell)$. In each case we introduce the spectral parameterization of the coefficients of the Cayley--Hamilton identity by the `eigenvalues' of the quantum matrices.

AI.tldr: 该论文针对正交O(k)型量子矩阵代数建立了Cayley-Hamilton定理的类似物，根据奇数高度(k=2ℓ-1)和偶数高度(k=2ℓ)的不同情况，以及偶数高度时正分量O^+(2ℓ)和负分量O^-(2ℓ)的不同版本，推导了三种不同形式的Cayley-Hamilton恒等式。
AI.motivation: 为量子矩阵代数建立Cayley-Hamilton定理的类似物，扩展经典线性代数理论到量子代数领域。
AI.method: 通过引入量子矩阵的'特征值'对Cayley-Hamilton恒等式的系数进行谱参数化，分别处理奇数高度和偶数高度的不同情况。
AI.result: 成功推导出三种不同形式的Cayley-Hamilton恒等式：奇数高度情况、偶数高度正分量情况和偶数高度负分量情况。
AI.conclusion: 建立了正交量子矩阵代数的Cayley-Hamilton定理类似物，为量子代数理论提供了新的数学工具和理论基础。

title: Leading terms of relations on a level 5 module over the twisted affine Lie algebra $A_2^{(2)}$
comment: 15 pages, submitted to a Special Volume in honor of Jim Lepowsky's 80th birthday
summary: One of the starting points of this work was the duality of Borcea relating standard level $k$ representations of $A_1^{(1)}$ and level $2k+1$ of $A_2^{(2)}$. For $k=1$ the combinatorial bases in both cases yield the two Capparelli identities and we wanted to see if there is a correspondence between the bases in terms of partitions for all $k\in\mathbb N$. By using the vertex operator relations in the principal picture for level $5$ standard $A_2^{(2)}$-modules we reduce a spanning set of Poincare-Birkhoff-Witt-type vectors in $L(5Λ_0)$ by removing the leading terms of relations and rendering a list of 34 ``difference'' conditions for partitions.We have with computer programs sorted out the sets of partitions satisfying these conditions and formed the partial generating series which agrees with the principally specialized character for all powers of $q$ up to $41$. Although our list of leading terms is incomplete, our results show that the corresponding combinatorial identity for $L_{A_2^{(2)}}(5Λ_0)$ drastically differs from the one for the Borcea dual $L_{A_1^{(1)}}(2Λ_0)$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Borcea对偶关系，探讨了A₁⁽¹⁾的k级表示与A₂⁽²⁾的2k+1级表示之间的对应关系。通过顶点算子方法，作者在A₂⁽²⁾的5级模中构建了组合基，发现其与对偶的A₁⁽¹⁾的2级模存在显著差异。
AI.motivation: 研究动机源于Borcea对偶关系，特别是想了解在k=1时产生两个Capparelli恒等式的组合基是否对所有k都存在分区对应关系。
AI.method: 使用主图中的顶点算子关系，在L(5Λ₀)中约化PBW型向量集，通过移除关系的主项得到34个分区"差异"条件，并用计算机程序筛选满足条件的分区集。
AI.result: 构建了满足34个条件的分区集，其部分生成级数与主特化特征在q的41次幂内完全一致。虽然主项列表不完整，但结果显示对应的组合恒等式与Borcea对偶的L_{A₁⁽¹⁾}(2Λ₀)存在显著差异。
AI.conclusion: 研究证实了A₂⁽²⁾的5级模L(5Λ₀)对应的组合恒等式与Borcea对偶的A₁⁽¹⁾的2级模存在根本性差异，尽管主项列表尚未完全确定。

title: Exchange relations and Frobenius subalgebras
summary: Bisch and Jones established a bijection between the intermediate subfactors of an irreducible subfactor and certain idempotents satisfying exchange relations. In this paper, we generalize this result to abelian monoidal categories through Frobenius subalgebras. As an application, we show that certain morphisms on a C*-correspondence arise from intermediate C*-subalgebras if and only if they are averaging operators.

AI.tldr: 本文推广了Bisch和Jones关于不可约子因子的中间子因子与满足交换关系的幂等元之间的双射结果，将其扩展到阿贝尔幺半范畴中的Frobenius子代数。
AI.motivation: 将Bisch和Jones关于子因子理论的重要结果从算子代数背景推广到更一般的范畴论框架，为研究中间结构提供更广泛的数学工具。
AI.method: 通过Frobenius子代数的方法，在阿贝尔幺半范畴中建立类似的双射关系，并应用于C*-对应关系中的态射分析。
AI.result: 证明了在C*-对应关系中，某些态射来自中间C*-子代数当且仅当它们是平均算子。
AI.conclusion: 成功将子因子理论中的中间结构分类推广到范畴论背景，为相关数学结构的研究提供了新的视角和方法。

title: A Stochastic Quantum Neural Network Model for Ai
summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) has drawn significant inspiration from neuroscience to develop artificial neural network (ANN) models. However, these models remain constrained by the Von Neumann architecture and struggle to capture the complexity of the biological brain. Quantum computing, with its foundational principles of superposition, entanglement, and unitary evolution, offers a promising alternative approach to modeling neural dynamics. This paper explores the possibility of a neuro-quantum model of the brain by introducing a stochastic quantum approach that incorporates random fluctuations of neuronal processing within a quantum framework. We propose a mathematical formalization of stochastic quantum neural networks (QNNS), where qubits evolve according to stochastic differential equations inspired by biological neuronal processes. We also discuss challenges related to decoherence, qubit stability, and implications for AI and computational neuroscience.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于随机量子方法的神经-量子大脑模型，将神经元处理的随机波动纳入量子框架，开发了随机量子神经网络(QNNS)的数学形式化。
AI.motivation: 传统人工神经网络受限于冯·诺依曼架构，难以捕捉生物大脑的复杂性。量子计算凭借叠加、纠缠和幺正演化等原理，为模拟神经动力学提供了有前景的替代方法。
AI.method: 引入随机量子方法，在量子框架中结合神经元处理的随机波动，提出随机量子神经网络(QNNS)的数学形式化，其中量子比特根据受生物神经元过程启发的随机微分方程演化。
AI.result: 开发了能够模拟生物神经过程的随机量子神经网络模型，为神经-量子大脑建模提供了理论框架。
AI.conclusion: 量子计算为大脑建模提供了新途径，但面临退相干、量子比特稳定性等挑战，对人工智能和计算神经科学具有重要意义。

title: Formal geometry and Tamarkin--Tsygan calculi of dg manifolds
summary: The main goal of this paper is to study the formal geometry of dg manifolds à la Fedosov. For any dg manifold $(\mathcal{M}, Q)$, we construct a Fedosov dg foliation (or dg Lie algebroid) $\mathcal{F}_Q \to \mathcal{N}_Q$. We establish homotopy contractions between their respective spaces of polyvector fields, differential forms, polydifferential operators, and polyjets. As a consequence, we prove that their respective Cartan calculi and noncommutative calculi, in the sense of Tamarkin--Tsygan, are isomorphic.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Fedosov风格的dg流形的形式几何，构造了Fedosov dg叶状结构，建立了多向量场、微分形式、多微分算子和多jet空间的同伦收缩，证明了它们的Cartan微积分和Tamarkin-Tsygan非交换微积分的同构性。
AI.motivation: 研究dg流形的形式几何结构，特别是Fedosov风格的构造方法，旨在建立不同几何结构之间的同伦等价关系。
AI.method: 为任意dg流形构造Fedosov dg叶状结构（或dg李代数胚），建立多向量场、微分形式、多微分算子和多jet空间的同伦收缩映射。
AI.result: 证明了Cartan微积分和Tamarkin-Tsygan非交换微积分之间的同构关系，建立了不同几何结构之间的等价性。
AI.conclusion: 通过Fedosov构造方法，成功建立了dg流形各种几何结构之间的同伦等价关系，为形式几何研究提供了新的工具和视角。

title: Quantum operations on the ring of symmetric functions
comment: 63 pages with expository endnotes. Comments are welcome
summary:
We define a version of stable maps into the classifying stack $B\mathrm{GL}_N$, and develop a corresponding notion of $K$-theoretic Gromov-Witten invariants. In this setting, the evaluation morphisms are not of finite type; the definition of the $K$-theoretic invariants proceeds by constructing a stability stratification of the moduli stack. In the absence of markings, the semistable locus of the stratification recovers moduli spaces of bundles on nodal curves considered by Gieseker, Nagaraj-Seshadri, Schmitt and Kausz.
  We also define versions of stable maps into quotient stacks of the form $Z/\mathrm{GL}_N$, where $Z$ is a projective $\mathrm{GL}_N$-scheme. We construct corresponding stability stratifications, whose semistable loci provide new proper moduli spaces of gauged maps from a varying nodal curve into $Z/\mathrm{GL}_N$.

AI.tldr: 本文定义了稳定映射到分类叠BGL_N的版本，并发展了相应的K理论Gromov-Witten不变量理论。在无标记情况下，半稳定轨迹恢复了Gieseker等人考虑的节点曲线上丛的模空间。
AI.motivation: 研究稳定映射到分类叠BGL_N的K理论Gromov-Witten不变量，解决评估态射不是有限型的问题，并为Z/GL_N形式的商叠构造新的模空间。
AI.method: 通过构造模叠的稳定性分层来定义K理论不变量，构建Z/GL_N商叠的稳定性分层，其半稳定轨迹提供了从变化节点曲线到Z/GL_N的规范映射的模空间。
AI.result: 成功定义了稳定映射到BGL_N的K理论Gromov-Witten不变量，并构造了Z/GL_N商叠的稳定性分层，得到了新的规范映射模空间。
AI.conclusion: 本文发展了稳定映射到分类叠的K理论不变量理论，并为商叠构造了新的模空间，扩展了Gromov-Witten理论的应用范围。

title: Quantization and Algebraic Index
summary: This article reviews the program on connecting Batalin-Vilkovisky (BV) quantization with index theories of algebraic type. We explain how the classical algebraic index theorem can be proved in terms of BV quantization of topological quantum mechanics. This is generalized to 2d chiral CFT in which we present an elliptic chiral analog of the algebraic index theory. As an application, we show how the generating function of all genus Gromov-Witten invariants on elliptic curves is mirror equivalent to an elliptic chiral index in the mirror BCOV theory.

AI.tldr: 本文回顾了将Batalin-Vilkovisky (BV) 量子化与代数型指标理论连接的研究项目，展示了经典代数指标定理如何通过拓扑量子力学的BV量子化证明，并推广到2维手性CFT中的椭圆手性代数指标理论。
AI.motivation: 连接BV量子化与代数指标理论，探索拓扑量子场论与指标理论之间的深刻联系，为数学物理提供新的统一框架。
AI.method: 通过BV量子化方法处理拓扑量子力学，推广到2维手性共形场论，构建椭圆手性代数指标理论，并应用镜像对称理论。
AI.result: 证明了经典代数指标定理可以通过拓扑量子力学的BV量子化推导，建立了椭圆手性代数指标理论，并展示了椭圆曲线上所有亏格Gromov-Witten不变量的生成函数与镜像BCOV理论中的椭圆手性指标的镜像等价性。
AI.conclusion: BV量子化为理解代数指标理论提供了强大的框架，成功连接了拓扑场论与指标理论，并在镜像对称中发现了新的数学结构联系。

title: Birack Bracket Quivers and Framed Links
summary: We introduce birack brackets, skein invariants of birack-colored framed classical and virtual knots and links with values in a commutative unital ring. The multiset of birack bracket values over the homset from a framed link's fundamental birack then forms an invariant of framed links. We then categorify this multiset to define a quiver-valued invariant of framed knots and links. From this quiver we define new polynomial invariants of framed knots and links.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了双轨括号，这是一种对双轨着色的经典和虚拟框架结和链环的skein不变量，取值于交换单位环。通过框架链环的基本双轨同态集上的双轨括号值多重集，定义了框架链环的不变量。然后对该多重集进行范畴化，定义了框架结和链环的quiver值不变量，并由此定义了新的多项式不变量。
AI.motivation: 研究框架结和链环的新不变量，特别是通过双轨结构和skein理论来构造不变量，并进一步通过范畴化方法提升这些不变量的表达能力。
AI.method: 使用双轨括号作为skein不变量，对双轨着色的框架结和链环进行不变量构造。通过基本双轨同态集上的值多重集获得不变量，然后进行范畴化得到quiver值不变量，最后从quiver导出多项式不变量。
AI.result: 成功构造了双轨括号不变量、quiver值不变量和新的多项式不变量，这些不变量能够区分不同的框架结和链环。
AI.conclusion: 双轨括号和相关的范畴化方法为框架结和链环提供了有效的不变量工具，扩展了结理论中的不变量理论体系。

title: Virtual Biquandle Cocycle Quiver Representations
summary: We introduce quiver representation-valued invariants of oriented virtual knots and links associated to a choice of finite virtual biquandle, abelian group, set of virtual Boltzmann weights, commutative unital ring and set of virtual biquandle endomorphisms. As an application we define new infinite families of polynomial virtual knot and link invariants via decategorification.

AI.tldr: 该论文介绍了基于有限虚拟双辫子、阿贝尔群、虚拟玻尔兹曼权重集合、交换幺环和虚拟双辫子自同态集合的定向虚拟结和链环的箭图表示值不变量，并通过去范畴化定义了新的多项式虚拟结和链环不变量无限族。
AI.motivation: 构建定向虚拟结和链环的新不变量，扩展虚拟结理论中的不变量工具集。
AI.method: 使用有限虚拟双辫子、阿贝尔群、虚拟玻尔兹曼权重集合、交换幺环和虚拟双辫子自同态集合来定义箭图表示值不变量。
AI.result: 成功定义了定向虚拟结和链环的箭图表示值不变量，并通过去范畴化过程得到了新的多项式虚拟结和链环不变量无限族。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为虚拟结理论提供了新的不变量构造框架，能够生成无限族的多项式不变量。
